author: jochembrouwer
content:
I have a question regarding 7702

https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7702#behavior

Rule (3) adds `authority` to `accessed_addresses`. What if a verification fails (e.g. 4 or 5), does this keep authority in the accessed addresses or does it remove it? (I assume keep it in?)

author: draganrakita
content: It should keep it as both steps 4. and 5. require loaded account from db.

author: jochembrouwer
content: Yes, makes sense, was also my line of thought, thanks ðŸ™‚
